summary: Here would be a nice summary what changed between versions

changes.custom-convert: function conversion(o) { return JSON.stringify({ 'id' : o.id, 'petId' : o.petId, 'quantity': o.quantity  }) }
changes.custom-revert: function conversion(o) { return JSON.stringify({ 'id' : o.id, 'petId' : o.petId, 'quantity': o.quantity, 'complete' : 'false', 'status' : 'available' }) }
